name: New York
hint: The most populous city in the United States, home to the Statue of Liberty and Times Square

name: Los Angeles
hint: The second-largest city in the US, known for Hollywood and the entertainment industry

name: Mexico City
hint: The capital of Mexico, one of the most populous cities in the world, built on an ancient lake bed

name: Toronto
hint: Canada's largest city, located on the northwestern shore of Lake Ontario

name: Chicago
hint: The third-largest city in the US, known as the Windy City, on the southwestern shore of Lake Michigan

name: Houston
hint: The largest city in Texas and fourth-largest in the US, home to NASA's Mission Control

name: Havana
hint: The capital of Cuba, known for its colorful colonial architecture and classic American cars

name: Vancouver
hint: A major city in western Canada, surrounded by mountains and the Pacific Ocean

name: Washington DC
hint: The capital of the United States, home to the White House and the National Mall

name: San Francisco
hint: A hilly city in California famous for the Golden Gate Bridge and cable cars

name: Montreal
hint: The largest city in Quebec, Canada, a French-speaking metropolis on an island in the St. Lawrence River

name: Guatemala City
hint: The capital and largest city of Guatemala, the most populous city in Central America
